    void changeEmailCellEvent​(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent editedCell)
    This method will allow users to edit the email from the table, by double clicking on a cell If email is not correct it will display a popup window.

    This method will allow users to edit the firstname from the table, by double clicking on a cell

    void changePhoneCellEvent​(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent editedCell)
    This method will allow users to edit the phone from the table, by double clicking on a cell If phone is not correct it will display a popup window.

    This method will delete a customer or customers in the database, when the delete customer button is pressed
